attributes.action: return to an Active Christian faith in government, in any and all decisions & policy-making from now on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the government to take into consideration the basics on which this country - UK - is built. These are primarily Christian/Biblical in nature, and cannot be relegated and/or disregarded because they may offend or otherwise upset any other religion or belief system. We cannot relegate the impact of Christianity & God on this country and still expect Him to bless continually us or our government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
